an organization that’s rapidly growing?” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”74px||12px||false|false”]Do you want to be part of an organization that’s rapidly growing?[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”We have been nationally recognized by Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in America in 2018 and 2019. We’ve also been honored locally by the Boston Business Journal the last three years (2017, 2018, & 2019) as one of the 50 fastest growing private companies in Boston.” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”]

We have been nationally recognized by Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in America for the past 3 consecutive years. We’ve also been honored locally by the Boston Business Journal every year since 2017 as one of the 50 fastest growing private companies in Boston.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Do you want to be part of an organization that’s rapidly growing?” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||12px||false|false”]Do you want a chance to move up within a company based on your performance not your tenure?[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”We have been nationally recognized by Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in America in 2018 and 2019. We’ve also been honored locally by the Boston Business Journal the last three years (2017, 2018, & 2019) as one of the 50 fastest growing private companies in Boston.” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”]If you’re as excited as we are, maybe an opportunity with ClinLab is right for you![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/scientific-staffing-meeting-planning-session.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”center” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”26px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”61px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/ClinLabStaffing_Celebrates_Success_2019.jpg” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”60px||||false|false”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Do you want to be part of an organization that’s rapidly growing?” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||12px||false|false”]Why Work for ClinLab Staffing & Recruiting?[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”We have been nationally recognized by Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in America in 2018 and 2019. We’ve also been honored locally by the Boston Business Journal the last three years (2017, 2018, & 2019) as one of the 50 fastest growing private companies in Boston.” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”]

We pride ourselves on our team atmosphere and the strong career path that we pave for our employees. We have a young team that works hard and enjoys the benefits. With consistent growth over the past few years, we are looking for engaged team members that will help us keep the momentum going.

ClinLab offers a competitive base salary along with a lucrative monthly commission plan (top earners can expect a six-figure income) and a year-end bonus plan. Our sales team participates in a yearly incentive trips! In addition to a great compensation structure we also offer health and dental as well!!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#e9edee” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”29px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”||74px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”21px” hover_enabled=”0″]

We are currently hiring for 1 position with multiple openings!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#29295b” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ae4542″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ toggle_text_color=”#29295b” toggle_font=”|700|||on||||” toggle_font_size=”18px”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Entry Level Scientific Recruiter (Sales)” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

APPLY NOW »

Watertown, MA
(Currently Remote, but looking for people who can commute to Watertown)
LOCAL CANDIDATE ONLY

ClinLab Staffing is looking for motivated, fun, energetic, sales minded and competitive college graduates who are interested in joining a growing team of professionals contributing to the success of our biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device clients.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and perform methods to identify qualified candidates through a variety of recruiting tools
  • Evaluate candidates’ past employment, education, skills and salary requirements to determine if they meet client’s requirements
  • Work independently and in a team environment
  • Coach candidates during the interview process, advising them on resume writing and interview skills
  • Extend employment offers and manage negotiation process
  • Complete reference checks and pre-employment paperwork
  • Maintain relationship by continuously networking
  • Work with mentors to get the skills necessary to lead and develop teams

Qualifications:

  • No previous experience necessary, we are just looking for individuals with a work-hard/play-hard mentality
  • Bachelor’s degree
  • Must be self-motivated, ambitious, and have a competitive drive to succeed in a fast-paced sales environment
  • Previous experience in sales or customer service a plus!
  • We are looking for future leaders, having a background in a leadership capacity is desired but not necessary.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” max_width=”2560px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px|0px|42px|0px|false|false” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”2727,2605,2507,2663″ show_title_and_caption=”off” show_pagination=”off” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
